DOC.brief_summary: In phase Ib , multi-centre , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled parallel group study , 120 subject moccasin type tinea pedis ( MTTP ) enrol approximately 11 centre USA , Canada Australia . The primary objective study assess patient response three W0027 regimens subject MTTP . Secondary objective include assessment safety , tolerability skin nail pharmacokinetics three Albaconazole regimen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Three W0027 Regimens Treatment Moccasin Type Tinea Pedis ( MTTP )
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1865 year , diagnose moccasin type tinea pedis ( positive dermatophyte culture , positive potassium hydroxide/calcofluor white preparation , Total Signs Symptoms Score least 4 ) . Females childbearing potential must use contraceptive method . Subjects receive CYP3A substrates potential QT prolongation ; use systemic antifungal drug within 30 day first dose ; topical antifungal within 2 week first dose . Also exclude clinically significant medical condition .
